table.name: vtiger_callassistance
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_callassistance` ( `callassistanceid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `call_assitance` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`callassistanceid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_callassistancecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_callassistancecf` ( `callassistanceid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`callassistanceid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
